task.title: Reset Phone Alignment
task.shortdesc: In the event of display issues in the Alignment tier of the Syllabification & Alignment view, it may be necessary to reset the phone alignment of IPA Target and IPA Actual transcriptions.

step.cmd: Select the Project Check Transcriptions... menu item.
step.stepresult: This will open the Check Transcriptions window.

step.cmd: Select the Reset phone alignment option.
Select the project, corpora, or sessions whose alignment you wish to reset, and click Next.
step.stepresult: Phon will re-perform the alignment for each selected session. After resetting syllabification or alignment, it will be necessary to visually verify these tiers.
